    • Method Detail

      • getPoints

        public Pnt2d[] getPoints​(int n,
                         double startAngle,
                         double arcAngle,
                         double sigma)
        Create an array of (x,y) coordinates on an ellipse of radii (a,b) and rotated r radians. Random noise is added if noise > 0.
        Parameters:
        n - number of points
        startAngle - initial angle (radians)
        arcAngle - arc angle (radians)
        sigma - amount of random noise
        Returns:
        an array of sample points
